title: An Act to rescind all previous calls for a federal constitutional convention

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Sabadosa of Northampton, a petition (subject to Joint Rule 12) of Lindsay N. Sabadosa for legislation to rescind all previous calls for a federal constitutional convention.  Veterans and Federal Affairs.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on House Rules
Reported, referred to the committee on Joint Rules, reported, rules suspended and referred to the committee on Veterans and Federal Affairs
